Text: desidas lavde k bal, chut mari k, jakir naik k andve, bhadve is chuttye [jakir] ki maa chudwane wali video kiyon upload ki hai... tujhe pata hai yeh YAZIDI bhadva Yahudi Agent hai... Dharam k naam pe logo ko chutya bana raha hai aur logo ka Mazhab aqeeda sub kuch naas kar raha hai... Laanat ho is par...

sarinmall85,
